name: Psychic Teller 3D
description:
Can you become the best psychic teller and run your own business? Help customers to see their futures and past!

Make the right choices for your customers. Change your mood to demonic or angelic. Psychic Teller 3D will be fun for the whole family.

Whether you are a fan of puzzlers, race games, simulation games, quiz games, brain teasers, role playing games or you just like psychic things, then Psychic Teller 3D is the game for you! Everyone better be careful of you!

Game Features:

1. Crystall Ball
Use your crystall ball to see the future and past. Tell the right choices to the customers.

2. Ouija Board
The ouija board will help you to talk with spirits. Don't be rude to spirits and learn information from them.

3. Voodoo Doll
Revenge is a dish best served cold. Use you voodoo doll to get revenge and make the customers happy.

4. Palm Reading
Read the hand lines and see their meanings. The lines will tell about love, money and health.

5. Coffee Fortune
Interpreting patterns made by coffee grounds left in the cup, it is a fun and ancient way of fortune telling.
